```{r}

library(tidyverse)

ggplot(data=poll_Feb) +
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=President.Good, y=President.Bad, color=ARS, size=Day))

ggplot(data=poll_Feb) +
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=President.Good, y=PPP, color=ARS, size=Day))

ggplot(data=poll_Feb) +
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=President.Bad, y=Theminjoo, color=Institute, size=Day)) +
  theme_set(theme_grey(base_family='AppleGothic')) +
  guides(col=guide_legend(ncol=2)) +
  labs(title='대통령 부정평가와 더불어민주당 지지율, 2023-2')

```

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

ggplot(data=poll_Feb, aes(x=President.Bad, y=Theminjoo, colour=Institute, size=Day)) +
  theme_set(theme_grey(base_family='AppleGothic')) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=loess, se=T, fullrange=F, linewidth=1, color='skyblue', alpha=0.3, fill='lightblue') +
  geom_text(aes(label=Theminjoo, vjust=-0.8, hjust=0)) + 
  guides(col=guide_legend(ncol=2)) +
  theme(legend.position='right') + 
  labs(title='대통령 부정평가와 더불어민주당 지지율', subtitle='2023년 2월', x='대통령 부정평가 (%)', y='더불어민주당 (%)', caption='연세대학교 경제학과, 응용통계학과 이주원')

ggplot(data=poll_Feb, aes(x=President.Good, y=PPP, colour=Institute, size=Day)) +
  theme_set(theme_grey(base_family='AppleGothic')) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=loess, se=T, fullrange=F, linewidth=1, color='skyblue', alpha=0.3, fill='lightblue') +
  geom_text(aes(label=PPP, vjust=-0.8, hjust=0)) + 
  guides(col=guide_legend(ncol=2)) +
  theme(legend.position='right') + 
  labs(title='대통령 긍정평가와 국민의힘 지지율', subtitle='2023년 2월', x='대통령 긍정평가 (%)', y='국민의힘 (%)', caption='연세대학교 경제학과, 응용통계학과 이주원')

ggplot(data=poll_Feb, aes(x=PPP, y=Theminjoo, colour=Institute, size=Day)) +
  theme_set(theme_grey(base_family='AppleGothic')) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_text(aes(label=round(Theminjoo-PPP,2), vjust=-0.8, hjust=0)) + 
  geom_abline(slope=1, intercept=0.2, linewidth=1, alpha=0.25, color='red') +
  guides(col=guide_legend(ncol=2)) +
  labs(title='더불어민주당과 국민의힘 지지율', subtitle='2023년 2월\n\n(더불어민주당 - 국민의힘) (%)', y='더불어민주당 (%)', x='국민의힘 (%)', caption='연세대학교 경제학과, 응용통계학과 이주원')

ggplot(data=poll_Feb, aes(x=President.Good, y=President.Bad, colour=Institute, size=Day)) +
  theme_set(theme_grey(base_family='AppleGothic')) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_text(aes(label=round(President.Bad-President.Good,2), vjust=-0.8, hjust=0)) + 
  guides(col=guide_legend(ncol=2)) +
  labs(title='대통령 긍정평가와 부정평가', subtitle='2023년 2월\n\n(부정평가 - 긍정평가) (%)', y='부정평가 (%)', x='긍정평가 (%)', caption='연세대학교 경제학과, 응용통계학과 이주원')

```
